/2020/07/08/world/coronavirus-updates.html,"C.D.C. to Revise Guidelines on Schools After Trump’s AttacksPresident Trump, flouting the advice of his own federal health experts, threatened to cut off aid to schools that refuse to fully reopen this fall.Vice President Mike Pence said the agency would have new recommendations next week: “We just don’t want the guidance to be too tough.”Houston, hit hard by an outbreak, canceled the state Republican Party convention, which was to have started next week. Here’s the latest.",,20200709-0000

/2020/07/08/sports/ncaafootball/ivy-league-fall-sports-football-coronavirus.html,Ivy League Places All Sports on Hold Until JanuaryThe decision could be influential for other universities: The league is the first Division I conference to suspend football for the fall.,,20200709-0000

/2020/07/08/us/supreme-court-birth-control-obamacare.html,"Employers Can Opt Out of Birth Control CoverageThe justices upheld Trump administration regulations that allow employers with religious objections to decline to provide contraception coverage.As a consequence of the ruling, about 70,000 to 126,000 women could lose coverage from their employers, according to government estimates.",,20200709-0000
